definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: This small window of consciousness was renowned as the best time for boning.
sentences.chinese: 這種1小時的有意識狀態被認爲是最佳的適應時間。

sentences.english: The faster the waves come, the more deliberately we need to navigate.
sentences.chinese: 浪潮來的越快，我們越是需要有意識地辨明方向。

sentences.english: Rulers of the Qin Dynasty consciously combined the eastern six states cultures for two times.
sentences.chinese: 秦統治者有意識地對東方六國文化進行整合有兩次。

sentences.english: Be aware of your actions atall times.
sentences.chinese: 保持對你的行爲有意識。

sentences.english: They do not consciously think of themselves as a class.
sentences.chinese: 他們並不有意識地把自己當作一個階層來看待。

sentences.english: Since Zhu Hua was a college student, he has been cultivating his commercial feelings consciously.
sentences.chinese: 從大學開始，朱華就有意識地培養自己的商業感覺。

sentences.english: To choose something like that on a conscious level would be pretty silly.
sentences.chinese: 有意識地選擇這樣一些事情真的很愚蠢。

sentences.english: All these tools are used for conscious projection of our personality.
sentences.chinese: 這些工具都用來對我們的個性進行有意識的表達。

sentences.english: Intentional creativity is achievable by understanding and mastering these four Ps.
sentences.chinese: 有意識的創造可以通過理解並掌握這四個P來達成。

sentences.english: I will consciously choose to plant something better. The results are truly spectacular.
sentences.chinese: 我會有意識地去選擇，種一些更好的東西，收穫頗豐。

sentences.english: Zope 3 separates consciously between local and global components.
sentences.chinese: Zope3有意識的隔離本地和全局的組件。

sentences.english: I had ever consciously entertained the idea of violating the laws of the land.
sentences.chinese: 我有意識地產生了違犯國法的想法。

sentences.english: The thinking that becomes conscious is only the smallest part.
sentences.chinese: 這樣有意識的思考變得只是最小的部分。

sentences.english: And afterwards, I intentionally used it as such.
sentences.chinese: 後來，我就有意識的讓它來做這種事情。

sentences.english: I moved to this city with my eyes open.
sentences.chinese: 我是有意識地遷到這丁城市來的。
